alert.note: Alert for Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Monroe, Escambia, Conecuh, northern Santa Rosa and north central Escambia Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 246 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles east of Uriah to 6 miles south of I65 And AL 113 to 6 miles southeast of Bratt. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brewton, Evergreen, Century, Flomaton, East Brewton, Uriah, Castleberry, Excel, Jay, Repton, Pollard, Riverview, I65 And US 84, Bratt, I65 And AL 113 and I65 And AL 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Alabama...and northwestern Florida.
